name: FraudLabs Pro for Easy Digital Downloads
author: FraudLabs Pro

sections.description:
This plugin is a fraud detection solution to prevent payment fraud and therefore minimize fraud losses or chargebacks in EasyDigitalDownloads platform. It performs a comprehensive check on every element available in each order, such as IP geolocation analyzer, proxy checker, email address, blacklist record, credit card information, transaction velocity and much more to unveil fraud orders accurately. You can have this fraud detection solution in place for free.

Sign up for a Free fraud protection plan now at https://www.fraudlabspro.com/sign-up and start protecting your EasyDigitalDownloads store from payment fraud.

This plugin supports Easy Digital Downloads version 2 and 3.

Why FraudLabs Pro Fraud Protection?

Flexibility

We offer you a flexible fraud prevention solution to identify a fraud order. You can use our FraudLabs Pro score to identify and determine a fraud order or customize your own validation rules to target a specific case, or a combination of both. You will see a list of actions that you can choose, and the fraud score will help you to take prominent decisions whether to accept or reject it.

Free

To get started, you can easily sign up a FraudLabs Pro Micro plan license key which is available to everyone – completely FREE! Yes, we are not offering you a trial version, but a free version to start protecting your online business. It’s absolutely free for 500 validation per month or sales less than 25K USD per month. There is no upfront credit card information or commitment required. No hidden cost whatsoever!

Easy to setup

The setup is simple and it only takes a few minutes to activate it. You just need to install our free FraudLabs Pro plugin, enter the API key and configure the settings.

Trustworthy

We have been in the fraud prevention industry for more than 10 years. Thousands of our clients are currently using our FraudLabs Pro Anti-Fraud solution. This Easy Digital Downloads plugin is one of 20 ready-made plugins for major e-commerce shopping cart platforms. Please check out our website https://www.fraudlabspro.com for more details.

Key Features

Below are the key features of FraudLabs Pro Fraud Detection plugin for Easy Digital Downloads:

  • Custom your own validation rules. There are more than 50 rules for your selection.
  • Put the high risk orders on hold for your manual review and release.
  • Automatically cancel the order if it was marked as rejected.
  • Receive notification via email/App/Slack when an order is canceled or pending for your review.
  • Support SMS verification to automate the customers’ phone number authentication.
  • Various fraud insight reports for your analysis.

For articles and tutorials about this anti-fraud plugin, please visit https://www.fraudlabspro.com/resources/categories/easydigitaldownloads
sections.installation:
Manual Installation (Use this method only if you are unable to install the plugin via the admin area)

  1. Download the plugin zip file.
  2. Unzip and upload the fraudlabs-pro folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Enter the License Key at the ‘Settings’ section. You can sign up for a free API key at https://www.fraudlabspro.com/sign-up .

How to enable the FraudLabs Pro feature

  1. Click on the Downloads menu page.
  2. Go to the Easy Digital Downloads Settings and click on the Extensions menu.
  3. On the FraudLabs Pro Settings page, Enter your FraudLabs Pro Fraud Detection API Key. You can sign up for a free API key at https://www.fraudlabspro.com/sign-up .
  4. Click on the Save Changes button.

For more information, please visit https://www.fraudlabspro.com
sections.changelog:
• 2.4.1 Enhanced previous order screen feature during plugin installation.
  • 2.4.0 Added Auto Sync order status feature.
  • 2.3.0 Updated to FraudLabs Pro API v2.
  • 2.2.2 Simplified installation wizard.
  • 2.2.1 Added Validation Rules section in settings page and fixed deactivate feedback issue.
  • 2.2.0 Supported item type classification.
  • 2.1.1 Updated “Requires at least” information.
  • 2.1.0 Supported SKU, added coupon code and payment gateway information for order/screen API.
  • 2.0.3 Enhanced checking.
  • 2.0.2 Updated order feedback fields.
  • 2.0.1 Fixed payment history save page issue.
  • 2.0.0 Updated Settings page to individual menu and added Wizard form upon plugin activation.
  • 1.2.0 Updated file structures to use composer for FraudLabs Pro PHP SDK.
  • 1.1.1 Add admin notice.
  • 1.1.0 Support Zapier notification based on fraud status, add Triggered Rules and is_phone_verified field into report page.
  • 1.0.1 Add feedback request.
  • 1.0.0 First release.
